title: Spatz Cluster Schema
description: Base description of a Spatz cluster and its internal structure and configuration.

name.description: Optional name for the generated wrapper.

boot_addr.description: Address from which all harts of the cluster start to boot. The default setting is `0x8000_0000`.

tcdm.description: Configuration of the Tightly Coupled Data Memory of this cluster.

size.description: Size of TCDM in KiByte. Divided in `n` banks. The total size must be divisible by the number of banks.

cluster_periph_size.description: Address region size reserved for cluster peripherals in KiByte.

zero_mem_size.description: Address region size reserved for the Zero-Memory in KiByte.

addr_width.description: Length of the address, should be greater than 30. If the address is larger than 34 the data bus needs to be 64 bits in size.

data_width.description: Data bus size of the integer core (everything except the DMA), must be 32 or 64. A double precision FPU requires 64 bit data length.

dma_data_width.description: Data bus size of DMA. Usually this is larger than the integer core as the DMA is used to efficiently transfer bulk of data.

trans.description: Outstanding transactions on the AXI network

id_width_in.description: Id width of the AXI plug into the cluster.

id_width_out.description: Id width of the AXI plug out of the cluster.

user_width.description: User width of the AXI plug into the cluster.

axi_cdc_enable.description: Place asynchronous CDCs on the cluster AXI interfaces.

sw_rst_enable.description: Place dedicated Power-On reset sync for hw/sw reset. It has effect only when axi_cdc_enable=true

axi_isolate_enable.description: Instantiate an AXI isolation module at the top level.

hart_base_id.description: Base hart id of the cluster. All cores get the respective cluster id plus their cluster position as the final `hart_id`.

mode.description: Supported mode by the processor, can be msu.

vm_support.description: Whether to provide virtual memory support (Sv32).

dma_axi_req_fifo_depth.description: Number of AXI FIFO entries of the DMA engine.

dma_req_fifo_depth.description: Number of request entries the DMA can keep

enable_debug.description: Whether to provide a debug request input and external debug features

vlen.description: Length of each vector register (in bits)

n_fpu.description: Number of FPUs in each Spatz instance

n_ipu.description: Number of IPUs in each Spatz instance

spatz_fpu.description: Activate floating point support in Spatz

spatz_nports.description: Number of TCDM ports per Spatz instance

xbar_latency.description: Latency mode of the cluster crossbar.

register_offload_rsp.description: Insert Pipeline registers into off-loading path (response).

register_core_req.description: Insert Pipeline registers into data memory request path.

register_core_rsp.description: Insert Pipeline registers into data memory response path.

register_tcdm_cuts.description: Insert Pipeline registers after each memory cut.

lat_comp_fp32.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP32.

lat_comp_fp64.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP64.

lat_comp_fp16.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP16.

lat_comp_fp16_alt.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP16alt (brainfloat).

lat_comp_fp8.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP8.

lat_comp_fp8alt.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP8alt.

lat_noncomp.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point non-computational instructions (except conversions), i.e., `classify`, etc.

lat_conv.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point conversion instructions.

lat_sdotp.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point expanding dot product with accumulation.

fpu_pipe_config.description: Pipeline configuration (i.e., position of the registers) of the FPU.

icache.title: Instruction cache configuration.
icache.description: Detailed configuration of the instruction cache.

size.description: Total instruction cache size in KiByte.

isa.title: ISA String containing RISC-V standard extensions.
isa.description: ISA string as defined by the RISC-V standard. Only contain the standardized ISA extensions.

Xdiv_sqrt.description: Enable hardware support for floating-point division and square-root. The iterative floating-point unit is known to produce some rounding inaccuracies so it is disabled by default.

xf16alt.title: Xf16alt 16-bit Brain-Float Extension
xf16alt.description: Enable Smallfloat Xf16alt extension, also known as brain-float.

num_int_outstanding_loads.description: Number of outstanding integer loads. Determines the buffer size in the core's load/store unit.

num_int_outstanding_mem.description: Number of outstanding memory operations. Determines the buffer size in the core's load/store unit.

num_spatz_outstanding_loads.description: Number of outstanding Spatz loads. Determines the buffer size in Spatz' load/store unit.

num_itlb_entries.description: Number of ITLB entries. Determines the core's size.

num_dtlb_entries.description: Number of DTLB entries. Determines the core's size.
